name: Dungeon Raider - Keys Are Limited Gamejam
name_original: Dungeon Raider - Keys Are Limited Gamejam
description:
Hello, this is my first game ever, made for a one week game jam. It needs a lot of polish, of course, but I like the result, and i would like to expand in this project later.

Most of the pixel art, specially the characters, was based on the work of 0x72, who uploads outstanding assets for free
 https://0x72.itch.io/

All music comes from Crazy Duck Games, go check it out too!
https://crazy-duck-games.itch.io/crazyduckmelodies01

Take into consideration, the game for now is just infinite, looping between various combinations of semi-randomized levels.

Even though is very barebones, i hope you enjoy
